mapper.select: select count(*) as count from cart where cust_id = #{cust_id} and product_code = #{product_code}
mapper.insert: insert into cart (cust_id, product_code, cart_qty) values (#{cust_id}, #{product_code}, #{cart_qty})
mapper.update: update cart set cart_qty = cart_qty + #{cart_qty} where cust_id = #{cust_id} and product_code = #{product_code}
